issues.description: The addGuestStudents method in the template repository has an extra parameter (boolean validateInput) not specified in the problem statement or implemented in the solution repository. This discrepancy could confuse students who are instructed to implement a method with only one parameter, potentially leading to compilation errors or uncertainty about the required signature.
issues.suggested_fix: Modify the template repository's addGuestStudents method to accept only one parameter (int numberOfNewGuestStudents) to align with the problem statement and solution, ensuring students can implement the method without conflicts.

issues.description: The method 'addGuestStudents' in the template repository includes an extra parameter 'boolean validateInput', which is not specified in the problem statement or present in the solution repository. This creates a naming inconsistency for the parameter, potentially confusing students about the required method signature and leading to difficulties in mapping the problem requirements to the template code.
issues.suggested_fix: Modify the template repository's 'addGuestStudents' method to remove the extra 'boolean validateInput' parameter, ensuring the method signature matches the problem statement with only one 'int' parameter for the number of new guest students.
